:: Wolfgang ::

:: Is walking towards the Maximal base when dozens of shots hit Wolfgang. He 
falls to the ground and looks back at all his comrades firing at him. ::

What the..... slag?  Reptilica, take you men and run! The Alliance has gone 
loco.

:: Plants his face into the dirt and struggles to get behind a rock. ::
